law.catch_line: Coverage Of Medically Necessary And Covered Services Otherwise Unavailable Within Carrier's Provider Network
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 61, Sec. 2 effective May 1, 2012. See 2012, 61, Sec. 5.] If a medically necessary and covered service is not available to a member within the carrier's provider network, the carrier shall cover the services out-of-network, for as long as the service is unavailable in-network.
